text: Bodijasinoni mutaxallif [ki az sirkat dar safari Makka va sulhi Hudajʙija xuddori kardaand, ʙaroi tavcehi kori xud] xohand guft: «[Muhofizati] Amvol va xonavodaamon moro giriftor kard; ʙarojamon omurzis ʙixoh». Onon cize, ki dar dilhojason nest, ʙar zaʙon meovarand. Bigu: «Agar Alloh taolo iroda kunad, ki ʙa sumo zijon jo sude ʙirasad, kist, ki dar muqoʙili [xosti] Alloh taolo az sumo difo' kunad? Ore, Alloh taolo az on ci mekuned, ogoh ast»
